preqs: Students must have passed one of the following: ETG1102, ETW1102, ETB1100, ETP1100 or ETW1000 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ETB2111, ETW1010, ETW2010, ETX2111}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ETB1100, ETG1102, ETP1100, ETW1000, ETW1102} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {ECM2111, ECN2111, ETW2111%, ETX2111%}

description: Sampling designs and inference; confidence limits and tests on means, proportion, differences. Cross tabulation, with chi square. Simple and multiple linear regression: regression with non-linear terms; regression with dummy variables. Introduction to analysis of variance. Uses Excel.
